txt.en: Stíling pointed out an ancient dead-fall in the mines, constructed by the Dwarves of Moria long ago, and suggested that it might be used to the advantage of the dwarves.

'I explored this secret passage while you were distracting the goblins inside Gamil Filik, and I am quite pleased to report that it is safe. It brings us to a tunnel right near Pukhlor, who looks to be a terrifying foe, the likes of whom I had not anticipated.\n\n'But there is good news: I thought I espied a loose bit of rock that would make a good trap for Pukhlor's downfall. If you sneak behind through this hidden passage, I think you will be able to get through and crush that villain by luring him to the trap.'
The hidden passage is just near Stíling in the hall near Gamil Filik.\n\nYou should enter the hidden passage to sneak behind the goblin camp.
'So our goblin neighbours will likely not trouble us in the future? That is excellent news, [placeholder]. Thank you for helping Stíling at Gamil Filik.'

The dead-fall trap lies near the goblin-camp at Gamil Filik, south-east of the Deep Descent camp.\n\nStíling has asked you to find the dead-fall trap and arm it, then lure Pukhlor to his death beneath the rocks.
Stíling is at his spot outside of Gamil Filik.\n\nYou should return to Stíling and let him know of Pukhlor's defeat.
'The goblins at Gamil Filik will soon fall, thanks to your efforts.'

'So Pukhlor lies in a grave of stone. Hopefully that will remind the goblins to whom Khazad-dûm truly belongs.\n\n'I do not care what evil lords support them, the very bones of Khazad-dûm stand against them.'
Thettmárr is in the Deep Descent camp, north of Gamil Filik.\n\nYou should return to Thettmárr and tell him of what you saw in the goblin-camp.
'The goblins at Gamil Filik will soon fall, thanks to your efforts.'
Use the hidden passage near Stíling
Arm the trap and lure Pukhlor into it
Return to Stíling (you may use the hidden passage)
Talk to Thettmárr at the Deep Descent
